title: [DOC] Improve documentation of DateTimeFeatures transformer
body:
#### Describe the issue linked to the documentation

<!--
Tell us about the confusion introduced in the documentation.
-->

The [docstring](https://www.sktime.org/en/stable/api_reference/auto_generated/sktime.transformations.series.date.DateTimeFeatures.html?highlight=datetimefeatures) doesn't appear to be rendering as expected (the bulleted lists aren't rendering correctly b/c they need a blank line between them and the text that preceeds and follows). 

Additionally, the short summary shouldn't include the the name of the transformer or the "e.g.". Something short like... "Extract date time features from series index." would work as the short summary.

The additional summary (that follows the short-summary) should also exclude the e.g. and include more description. Does this work with all index types? Give a better general sense on the type of features returned, etc. 

#### Suggest a potential alternative/fix

<!--
Tell us how we could improve the documentation in this regard.
-->
